column5: Lakefront property with convenient access to Main Street in Gun Barrel City for shopping, restaurants, grocery stores, and pharmacies.  Full kitchen Full washer and dryer Towels and bedding Various sundries Various spices and kitchen condiments Gas grill Charcoal grill Fire pit Hammock Stereo system with outdoor speakers Mosquito repellant system 2 televisions with DirecTv service High speed wireless internet Air mattresses available upon request  Either my local property manager or I will meet you upon check in to give you a key and introduce you to the property.  Quiet spot on the waterfront with the convenience of being extremely close to several restaurants, grocery stores, and pharmacies.  Parking for 5 vehicles.  Full kitchen Full washer and dryer Towels and bedding Various sundries Various spices and kitchen condiments Gas grill Charcoal grill Fire pit Hammock Stereo system with outdoor speakers Mosquito repellant system 2 televisions with DirecTv service High speed wireless internet Air mattresses available upon request  Either my local property manager or I will meet you upon check in to give you a key and introduce you to the property.  Rates may be higher for popular dates such as Memorial Day, Labor Day, July 4, spring break, Canton First Monday, Cedar Creek Lake Poker Run, and Fathers Day.
